#include<bits/stdc++.h>
//wrong question
using namespace std;
main()
{
    int T,i;
    int U[125],L[125],ans;
    string s;
    cin>>T;
    while(T--)
    {

        memset(U,0,sizeof(U));
        memset(L,0,sizeof(L));
        ans=0;
        cin>>s;
        for(i=0;i<s.length();++i)
        {
            if(islower(s[i]))
            {
                ++L[s[i]];
            }
            else if(isupper(s[i]))
                {++U[s[i]];
                }
            else
                continue;
        }
        for(i=0;i<125;++i)
        {

            ans+=ceil(L[i]/2.0)+ceil(U[i]/2.0);

        }
        cout<<ans<<endl;

    }
}
